title: Goodies!
itunes:title: Goodies!
description: Today on The Cigar Authority John Gazerro from Oliva Family of Cigars & Studio Tabac drops by to share some Oliva goodies. Later in the show we smoke the new La Palina "El Dario," talk about the theory of nicotine not being addictive, new cigars hitting the shelves at Two Guys Smoke Shop, the ULTIMATE event, a head-to-head battle between Mr Jonathan and Chuck Morrison, and lots lots more! It's time for the finer things in life... It's time for The Cigar Authority!
